attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: STOP property buyers demanding a lower price at Exchange. Stop gazundering. When an offer is accepted that should be final unless there are genuine reasons disclosed in the survey.

rejection.details: Your title, i.e the main sentence, should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
